page.title: 03GREAT MEOLS:THE HEADTEACHER.
page.content: {Extract of interview 1:5:1985}by{Sarah {Hughes}and{Mark Parry.} Mr.{J.T.Owen}B.A. M.Ed.has been a Head master for 10 years having taught for 30 years,4 in his present school.He was educated at Carmarthen and Liverpool University. As a young man he wanted to be a soccer player! His hobbies include golf,D.I.Y.,reading, travel and watching television. Among his favourite authors are included: Nicholas Monseratt and Nevil Shute. Mr. Owen has a preference for informative books and teacher journals eg."Times Educational Supplement". His favourite music is Country and Western,some classical and some"Pop Songs".His favourite recording group is" Abba "and favourite singers include Geraint Evans and Don Williams. Mr.Owen has two pets-a cat and a dog.
